src_text: LEKGOTLA LA KABINETE
trg_text: Phase 2 Plan

src_text: Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa o bidit e Lekgotla la Kabinete ka Labone la 27 Pherekgong 2022.
trg_text: President Cyril Ramaphosa convened the Cabinet Lekgotla on Thursday, 27 January 2022.

src_text: Lona le be le tsenet we ke baetapele bao ba emet ego makala ka moka a mmu
trg_text: It was attended by the leadership structures representing all spheres of governmen They included Ministers, Deputy Ministers, Premiers, Directors-General and leadership of the South African Local Government Associatio

src_text: Bona ba be ba akaret a Ditona, Batlat aditona, Ditonakgolo, Balaodipharephare mmogo le boetapele bja Mokgatlo wa Mebu oselegae ya Afrika Borwa (SALGA).
trg_text: Ms Nomthandazo Lichie Moyo as Deputy Director-General (DDG): Rural Development at the Department of Agriculture, Land Reform and Rural Development (DALRRD).

src_text: Mopresidente o memile baetapele ba mmu o bjalo ka karolo ya go logaganya le go lebanya karabelo ya mmu o go dihlotlo t eo naga e lebaganego nat o, kudu go bea
trg_text: The President invited the government leaders as part of integrating and aligning government s responses to challenges facing the country, particularly to focus urgently on addressing the triple challenges of poverty, unemployment and inequalit He called on the leaders to effect fundamental reforms to revive economic growth and create much-needed employment at a far higher rat

src_text: edi ka potlako tabeng ya go mekamekana le dihlotlo t e tharo elego bohloki, tlhokego ya me omo le go se lekalekan O ipiledit e go baetapele go tla ka dipeakanyoleswa t e bohlokwa t a go tso a kgolo ya ikonomi le go hlola me omo yeo e nyakegago kudu ka lebelo le legol
trg_text: The SA Connect project targets to achieve 80% broadband access in communities and government facilities over the next three years with a minimum speed capacity of 10Mbps per second and 100 Mbps for the high-demand facilitie

src_text: Mopresidente o bonagadit e bohlokwa bja Vision 2030 ya Leano la Tlhabollo la Boset haba le Leano la Mpshafat o le Tso olo o ya Ikonomi go akgofi a maitekelo a go hlabolla seemo sa MaAfrika Borw
trg_text: The President underscored the centrality of Vision 2030 of the National Development Plan and the Economic Reconstruction and Recovery Plan to accelerate efforts to improve the conditions of South African

src_text: Go tlalelet a go t a seemo sa ikonomi le dipeakanyoleswa, Lekgotla la Kabinete le sekasekile gape tlhabollo ya mananeokgoparara, t hirelet o ya enet i, phetolelasegaeng le tso olo o ya diintaseteri, peakanyoleswa ya naga le temo, le mpshafat o ya dikgwebo t a mmu
trg_text: In addition to the state of the economy and structural reforms, the Cabinet Lekgotla also discussed infrastructure development, energy security, localisation and industrialisation, land reforms and agriculture, and reform of state-owned enterprise

trg_text: Efforts to reduce unemployment and poverty will include a blend of increased private sector employment, publicly funded employment and expanded social protection for unemployed peopl

trg_text: CABINET LEKGOTLA

src_text: Dikahlaahlo t a Lekgotla la Kabinete ke t a go tsebagat a ditlapele t a mmu o ngwageng wo t eo Mopresidente Ramaphosa a tla di alago ka botlalo nakong ya Polelo ya Maemo a Set haba ka Labone la 10 Dibokwane 2022.
trg_text: The Cabinet Lekgotla deliberations are to inform government s priorities for the year ahead which President Ramaphosa will set out during the State of the Nation Address on Thursday, 10 February 2022.

src_text: Kabinete e feti it e kabo ya legato la bobedi la prot eke ya SA Connec Leano le le phethagat a Pholisi ya Mararankodi a Inthanete yeo e amoget wego ke Kabinete ka 2013.
trg_text: Cabinet approved the roll-out of the second phase of the SA Connect projec The plan gives effect to the country s Broadband Policy which was adopted by Cabinet in 2013.

src_text: Legato la mathomo le bile la pulamadibogo la go tla ka tirelo ya mararankodi a inthanete ya Dimekabaete (di-Mbp) t e 10 go mafelo a mmu o a bohlokwahlokw
trg_text: Phase 1 served as a pilot phase to provide 10 Megabits (Mbps) broadband services to about 970 critical government facilitie

trg_text: The approved second phase will be rolled out using state-owned entities (State Information Technology Agency [SITA]); Broadband Infraco and Sentech) and the industr Over the next 36 months, the project will connect the remaining government facilities, communities and household
